meanings.definition: Relating to or derived from picric acid.
meanings.sent1: The picric solution turned the paper yellow.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the picric properties of the compound.
meanings.sent3: The picric color of the flower caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as picric as a thunderstorm.
meanings.sent5: The picric smell in the lab lingered for hours.
